dmca.title: Important legal notice regarding disclosure of you account information
dmca.body:
Verizon Online respects the privacy rights of our customers.  Accordingly, we are sending you this notice to inform you that we have recieved a court issued subpoena which requires us to produce certain information regarding your Verizon Online acount (including your name, address, telephone number, e-mail address and Media Access Control ("MAC") address).  The case in which the subpoena has been issued is Arista Records, Inc. et. al. v. Does 1-125, Civ. Action No. 04-1223 (RCL)(D.C.C) which is peding in federal court in Washington D.C.

The information has been subpoenaed by persons claiming to be the owner (or authorized representative of the owner) of copyrighted music, video or software.  The person requesting this infomation has alleged in a complaint filed with the court that your use of peer-to-peer technology may constitute an infingement of the rights of the copyright owner, and you were identified as being the user of IP _.__.__.__ on 2004-02-21 03:00:03 EST.
